column4: Anybody out there have any helpful ideas on how I can resolve my issue. winstonw suggested I run memtest and so far it has not found any errors after one full pass... I have been trying to install ubuntu from scratch on an old p4 shuttle but my fresh install is constantly getting stuck on configuring APT source at 71%
err, you should try to read the system log, 'apt gets stuck' isn't very useful for google.
I don't know. it's been about four years since I did that.
